recipes.ingredient: 500g ground beef, 1 onion, 2 cloves of garlic, 400g canned tomatoes, 2 tbsp tomato paste, 1 tsp dried oregano, salt and pepper to taste, 300g spaghetti
recipes.process:
1. Heat oil in a pan. Add chopped onions and minced garlic.
2. Add ground beef and cook until browned.
3. Add tomatoes, tomato paste, oregano, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 20 minutes.
4. Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
5. Serve the Bolognese sauce over cooked spaghetti.

recipes.ingredient: 1 cup butter, 2 cups sugar, 4 large eggs, 1 tsp vanilla extract, 1 cup all-purpose flour, 1/2 cup cocoa powder, 1/4 tsp salt, 1 cup chocolate chips
recipes.process:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a baking pan.
2. Melt the butter and mix in sugar, eggs, and vanilla extract.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk flour, cocoa powder, and salt.
4. Combine wet and dry ingredients, then fold in chocolate chips.
5. Pour the batter into the baking pan and spread evenly.
6. Bake for about 25-30 minutes.
7. Let the brownies cool before cutting into squares.

recipes.ingredient: 500g chicken breast, 1 cup plain yogurt, 2 tbsp tikka masala spice mix, 1 tsp ginger paste, 1 tsp garlic paste, 1 cup tomato sauce, 1 cup heavy cream, salt to taste, fresh cilantro leaves for garnish
recipes.process:
1. Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces and marinate in yogurt, half of the tikka masala spice mix, ginger paste, and garlic paste for a few hours.
2. Preheat a grill or oven. Cook marinated chicken until fully cooked.
3. In a pan, heat the remaining tikka masala spice mix.
4. Add tomato sauce and simmer for a few minutes.
5. Pour in heavy cream and cooked chicken. Simmer for another 10 minutes.
6. Garnish with cilantro leaves and serve with rice or naan.

recipes.ingredient: 1 pizza dough, 1/2 cup tomato sauce, 1 1/2 cups mozzarella cheese, fresh basil leaves, olive oil, salt and pepper to taste
recipes.process:
1. Preheat the oven to the highest temperature.
2. Roll out the pizza dough and place it on a baking sheet.
3. Spread tomato sauce over the dough, leaving a border.
4. Sprinkle mozzarella cheese over the sauce.
5. Drizzle olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
6. Bake in the oven until the crust is golden and the cheese is bubbly.
7. Top with fresh basil leaves before serving.

recipes.ingredient: 2 cups heavy cream, 1 vanilla bean, 5 egg yolks, 1/2 cup granulated sugar, brown sugar for caramelizing
recipes.process:
1. Preheat the oven to 325°F (160°C).
2. Split the vanilla bean and scrape the seeds into the cream. Heat the cream until hot but not boiling.
3. In a bowl, whisk egg yolks and granulated sugar until smooth.
4. Slowly pour the hot cream into the egg mixture, whisking constantly.
5. Strain the mixture and pour into ramekins.
6. Place the ramekins in a baking dish. Add hot water to the dish to create a water bath.
7. Bake for about 40-45 minutes until the custard is set but slightly jiggly.
8. Refrigerate for a few hours.
9. Sprinkle a thin layer of brown sugar on top and caramelize with a kitchen torch.

recipes.ingredient: 1 lb pork shoulder, 3/4 cup pineapple juice, 3 tbsp achiote paste, 3 cloves of garlic, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp oregano, salt and pepper to taste, corn tortillas, diced onions, chopped cilantro, sliced pineapple
recipes.process:
1. Blend pineapple juice, achiote paste, garlic, cumin, oregano, salt, and pepper to make the marinade.
2. Marinate sliced pork in the mixture for several hours or overnight.
3. Grill or pan-fry the marinated pork until cooked and slightly charred.
4. Warm corn tortillas.
5. Serve the pork in tortillas, topped with diced onions, chopped cilantro, and sliced pineapple.

recipes.ingredient: 1 cup butter, 2 cups all-purpose flour, 1/2 cup powdered sugar, 4 large eggs, 2 cups granulated sugar, 1/3 cup lemon juice, 2 tsp lemon zest, 1/2 tsp baking powder, powdered sugar for dusting
recipes.process:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a baking pan.
2. In a bowl, mix butter, flour, and powdered sugar until crumbly.
3. Press the mixture into the baking pan and bake for 20 minutes.
4. In another bowl, whisk eggs, granulated sugar, lemon juice, lemon zest, and baking powder.
5. Pour the mixture over the baked crust and bake for an additional 25 minutes.
6. Let the bars cool completely, then dust with powdered sugar before cutting.

recipes.ingredient: 1 lb beef stew meat, 2 carrots, 2 potatoes, 1 onion, 2 cloves of garlic, 2 cups beef broth, 1 cup red wine, 1 tbsp tomato paste, 1 tsp thyme, 1 tsp rosemary, salt and pepper to taste
recipes.process:
1. Heat oil in a pot. Brown the beef stew meat on all sides.
2. Add chopped onions and minced garlic. Sauté until onions are translucent.
3. Stir in tomato paste and cook for a minute.
4. Pour in red wine and simmer until reduced.
5. Add beef broth, thyme, rosemary, salt, and pepper.
6. Cover and simmer for about 1.5 to 2 hours until the meat is tender.
7. Add diced carrots and potatoes. Continue to simmer until vegetables are cooked.
8. Adjust seasoning and serve.

recipes.ingredient: 6 cups sliced apples, 3/4 cup granulated sugar, 1 tsp cinnamon, 1/4 tsp nutmeg, 2 tbsp butter, 2 pie crusts (homemade or store-bought), 1 egg (for egg wash)
recipes.process:
1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. Mix sliced apples, sugar, cinnamon, and nutmeg in a bowl.
3. Roll out one pie crust and fit it into a pie pan.
4. Fill the crust with the apple mixture and dot with butter.
5. Roll out the second crust and place it over the apples. Trim and crimp the edges.
6. Cut slits in the top crust to allow steam to escape.
7. Beat the egg and brush it over the top crust for a golden finish.
8. Bake for 45-50 minutes until the crust is golden and the filling is bubbly.
9. Let the pie cool before serving.

recipes.ingredient: Sushi rice, Nori (seaweed sheets), Fish (such as tuna, salmon), Vegetables (such as cucumber, avocado, carrots), Soy sauce, Wasabi, Pickled ginger
recipes.process:
1. Prepare sushi rice according to package instructions.
2. Lay a bamboo sushi rolling mat on a clean surface and place a sheet of nori on it.
3. Wet your hands and spread a layer of sushi rice evenly over the nori, leaving about an inch at the top.
4. Arrange thin strips of fish and vegetables in the center of the rice.
5. Roll the sushi using the mat, applying gentle pressure as you go.
6. Wet the top edge of the nori with water and seal the roll.
7. Use a sharp knife to slice the roll into bite-sized pieces.
8. Serve with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.

recipes.ingredient: 2 cups graham cracker crumbs, 1/2 cup butter, 24 oz cream cheese, 1 cup granulated sugar, 1 tsp vanilla extract, 4 large eggs, 1 cup sour cream, fruit topping (such as strawberries or blueberries)
recipes.process:
1. Preheat the oven to 325°F (160°C).
2. Mix graham cracker crumbs and melted butter. Press the mixture into the bottom of a springform pan to form the crust.
3. In a large bowl, beat cream cheese until smooth.
4. Gradually add sugar and vanilla extract, and continue beating.
5. Add eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
6. Fold in sour cream.
7. Pour the cream cheese mixture over the crust in the pan.
8. Bake for about 50-60 minutes until the edges are set but the center still jiggles.
9. Turn off the oven and let the cheesecake cool inside with the door ajar.
10. Chill in the refrigerator for several hours or overnight.
11. Top with fruit topping before serving.
